ja374:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja374:0.4_0: The Shorter Discourse on the ground.
ja374:1.1_0: “For one who undertakes and follows the goods,
ja374:2.3_0: For I’ve taught you the Dhamma
ja374:2.4_0: I’m your daughter to stay too.”
ja374:3.1_0: “The sacred flame of a grove of golden shower,
ja374:5.4_0: it seems to you like this!
ja374:6.2_0: just as you say to India.
ja374:6.3_0: But I couldn’t go to the place
ja374:6.4_0: I’ll stay in the home of the lay life.”
ja374:7.2_0: from the jungle they carry it back.
ja374:7.3_0: Now that you do the bad
ja374:8.1_0: The Shorter Discourse on the fourth born.
